text:
AqgnEqyamaqShTAka#pAlaqM nirva#patiq hira#NyaqM dakShi#NA sArasvaqtaM caqruM ~Mva#thsataqrI dakShi#NA sAviqtraM dvAda#SakapAla-mupaddhvaqstO dakShi#NA pauqShNaM caqru(gg) SyAqmO dakShi#NA bAr.haspaqtyaM caqru(gm) Si#tipRuqShThO dakShi#Naiqndra-mEkA#daSakapAlamRuShaqBO dakShi#NA vAruqNaM daSa#kapAlaM maqhAni#raShTOq dakShi#NA sauqmyaM caqruM baqBrurdakShi#NA tvAqShTramaqShTAka#pAla(gm) SuqNThO dakShi#NA vaiShNaqvaM tri#kapAqlaM ~MvA#maqnO dakShi#NA || 33
(AqgnEqya(gm) hira#Nya(gm) sArasvaqtaM-dvica#tvAri(gm)Sat) (A17)
